info.title: USA Today Music Reviews
info.description: The USA TODAY Music Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY music review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

get.description: The USA TODAY Music Reviews API provides a method for retrieving USA TODAY music review content. In addition to the textual content of a review, the API returns various types of metadata associated with each title. All reviews information is available in a JSON handler.

parameters.name: albums
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available album reviews.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: The API key used for the query

parameters.name: artist
parameters.description: Returns a list of all available artists who have had an album reviewed.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Use this value to set the number of reviews returned. By default, mostrecent directory returns 25 reviews and the book and author directories return all avaialable information.

parameters.name: maxrating
parameters.description: Use these parameters to set a minimum and/or maximum rating for the album or movie review returned.

parameters.name: minrating
parameters.description: Use these parameters to set a minimum and/or maximum rating for the album or movie review returned.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: By default, returns the most 25 most recent reviews. The number of reviews returned may be altered using the count parameter.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Use this parameter to limit data returned to a specific year.
